resources.string: Reference Fingerprint sensor code with full features and documentation is located in MorphoSmart SDK (in MorphoSample folder), which is included in ID Screen SDK.
Reference fingerprint sensor code with full features and documentation is located in MorphoLiveScan SDK, which is located in ID Screen SDK archive.

Warning: cannot connect to fingerprint sensor.

Please open item "Peripheral Management" in this application main menu and check following settings :
	- Fingerprint sensor should be enabled
	- USB mode should be set to "Host". Or it should be set to "Auto" and PC shouldn't be connected to tablet.

Please also check that no other fingerprint sensor is connected to tablet.
Preflash and flash brightness can be checked by taking a picture.\nPlease open Camera application below.

Your device is not running example secure firmware (version Sxx-y).\nSome features will not be available or will not work properly.\nPlease update your device to example secure firmware to use all features.

Your device is not running example secure firmware (version Kxx-y).\nSome features will not be available or will not work properly.\nPlease update your device to example secure firmware to use all features.
Initializing fingerprint sensor, please wait â€¦
